channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Poor road finish which will breakdown and cause issues., 9th October
item.description:
This road has just been redone but they have not followed the map sent out showing the junction being tarmaced into dunster road further in. The new tarmac will not last with the traffic flow if this does not get carriee on a few meters into Dunster road, following origional plan sent to home owners. They are on site tomorrow friday 10th October please can you sort Regards

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Dunster Road, Fiddler's Green, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic light head been moved, 9th October
item.description:
At the pedestrian crossing from Meadow Park the traffic light head has been moved around so that the lights are not clear to cars. A car ran the red light this morning when I was trying to cross.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Bath Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Traffic light head is facing wrong direction

item.title: Missing sign (Parking) problem, 9th October
item.description:
A lot of vehicles that are not residents are parking in the road and make it very difficult for residents to get in and out of the Cul De Sac. This is particularly risky when/if an ambulance needs to use the road to get to a patient or carers/nurses. Can anything be done.
Report on FixMyStreet
